@dev Constructor, creates RefundEscrow.
@param goal Funding goal
@return minimum amount of funds to be raised in wei.
nodes.name: goal

nodes.documentation:
@dev Investors can claim refunds here if crowdsale is unsuccessful
@param beneficiary Whose refund will be claimed.
nodes.name: claimRefund

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks whether funding goal was reached.
@return Whether funding goal was reached
nodes.name: goalReached

nodes.documentation: @dev escrow finalization task, called when finalize() is called
nodes.name: _finalization

nodes.documentation: @dev Overrides Crowdsale fund forwarding, sending funds to escrow.
